Dear {!PM_Configure__c.Mentor__c},
We hope this message finds you well. This is to inform you that, unfortunately {!PM_Configure__c.Reporting_Contact__c} of Project {!PM_Configure__c.Project_Name__c} has rejected to submit the performance feedback for {!PM_Configure__c.Mentee__c} at this time due to the below stated reason.
{!PM_Configure__c.Rejection_Cancellation_Reason__c}
We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding. Thank you for your consideration.
Best Regards,
Cloud Peritus Team
